reviewText: This box set contains 3 previously released operas in their original DVD cases, housed in a thin cardboard box. All operas are available on Amazon individually. THE OPERAS ARE: UN BALLO IN MASCHERA (4.9 stars) 1990 Plcido Domingo is Gustavo. Josephine Barstow is Amelia. Leo Nucci is Renato. Georg Solti conducts the Weiner Philharmoniker. Everything is excellent. More information and Amazon customer reviews can be found here: Ballo in Maschera And here: Verdi - Un ballo in maschera / Domingo Barstow Quivar Jo Nucci Rydl Chaignaud Wiener Phil. Solti Schlesinger Salzburg Festival 1900 LA FORZA DEL DESTINO (4.8 stars) 2007 Violeta Urmana is Donna Leonora. Marcello Giordani is Don Alvaro. Carlo Guelfi is Don Carlo. Zubin Mehta conducts the Orchestra of the Maggio Musicale Fiorentino. Excellent singing. Acting is usually excellent although singers sometimes sing to the audience rather than their co-actors. More information and Amazon customer reviews can be found here: La Forza Del Destino And here: Verdi: La Forza Del Destino (Firenze 2007) (Violeta Urmana, Carlo Guelfi, Marcello Giordani,) (Arthaus: 107325) [DVD] [NTSC] by Violeta Urmana LA TRAVIATA (4.9 stars) 2007 Angela Gheorghiu is Violetta Valry. Ramn Vargas is Alfredo Germont. Roberto Frontali is Giorgio Germont. Lorin Maazel conducts at La Scala. Everything is excellent. More information and Amazon customer reviews can be found here: La Traviata at La Scala And here: Verdi: La Traviata [DVD] [2008] [NTSC] by Angela Gheorghiu
